LanguageData.ReaverPain.stages.0.label: 有点痛
LanguageData.ReaverPain.stages.0.description: Ow... Heh heh heh... I could get used to this!
LanguageData.ReaverPain.stages.1.label: 中等程度的疼痛
LanguageData.ReaverPain.stages.1.description: Ughhh... It hurts, but I love it! Keep it coming!
LanguageData.ReaverPain.stages.2.label: 经历急性疼痛
LanguageData.ReaverPain.stages.2.description: Ouch... I think something's broken... But what an exquisite feeling!
LanguageData.ReaverPain.stages.3.label: 令人休克的剧痛
